dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3116 EH: Quarterly Financial Report Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To extend by 15 years the authority of the Secretary of Commerce to conduct the quarterly financial report program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Quarterly Financial Report Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Extension of authority for Secretary of Commerce to conduct quarterly financial report program
section.text: Section 4(b) of the Act entitled An Act to amend title 13, United States Code, to transfer responsibility for the quarterly financial report from the Federal Trade Commission to the Secretary of Commerce, and for other purposes, approved January 12, 1983 (Public Law 97â€“454; 13 U.S.C. 91 note), is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2030.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 24, 2015.
